Segment.Title: ?1 - ?2 - ?3 Script Overview
Segment.Query: select w.name, ka.name, ka.description, ka.custom, wa.expectedresult from (((((workflowaction wa left join workflownextaction wna on wa.id = wna.keyactionid) left join workflow w on w.id = wa.workflowid) left join keyaction ka on wa.keyactionid = ka.id) left join testscript ts on ts.id = w.testscriptid) left join project p on ts.projectid = p.id) left join client c on p.clientid = c.id where ts.name = '?1' and p.name = '?2' and c.name = '?3' order by w.id, wna.nextactionid;
